00132 cache_content_status_t  cache_content_open(  cache_content_entry_t        * pentry,
00133                                              cache_content_client_t       * pclient,
00134                                              cache_content_status_t       * pstatus ) 
00135 {
00136   int                     localfd ;
00137 
00138   if( ( pentry == NULL ) || ( pstatus == NULL ) ) 
00139      return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00140 
00141   if( pclient->use_cache == 0 ) 
00142     pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op = 0 ; /* to force opening the file */
00143 
00144   if( ( pclient->use_cache == 0 ) ||
00145       ( time( NULL ) - pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op  > pclient->retention ) )
00146    {
00147      
00148      if ( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd > 0 )
00149      {
00150        close(  pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd ) ;
00151      }
00152      
00153      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd = -1 ;
00154      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op = 0 ;
00155    }
00156  
00157   if( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op == 0 )
00158    { 
00159      /* Close file to be sure */
00160      if( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd > 0 )
00161      {
00162        close( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd ) ;
00163      }
00164        
00165      /* opened file is not preserved yet */
00166      if( ( localfd = open( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, O_RDWR, 0750 ) ) == -1 )
00167        {
00168           if( errno == ENOENT )
00169             *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_NOT_FOUND ;
00170           else
00171             *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00172    
00173           return *pstatus ;
00174        }
00175        
00176      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd = localfd ;
00177    }
00178    
00179   /* Regular exit */
00180   pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op  = time( NULL ) ;
00181         
00182   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00183   return *pstatus ;  
00184         
00185 } /* cache_content_open */
00186 
00203 cache_content_status_t cache_content_close( cache_content_entry_t        * pentry,
00204                                             cache_content_client_t       * pclient,
00205                                             cache_content_status_t       * pstatus ) 
00206 {
00207   if( ( pentry == NULL ) || ( pstatus == NULL ) ) 
00208      return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00209 
00210   /* if nothing is opened, do nothing */
00211   if( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd < 0 ) 
00212    {
00213      *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00214      return *pstatus ;
00215    }
00216 
00217   if( ( pclient->use_cache == 0 ) ||  
00218       ( time( NULL ) - pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op  > pclient->retention ) ||
00219       ( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd > pclient->max_fd_per_thread ) ) 
00220    {
00221      close(  pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd ) ;
00222      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd = -1 ;
00223      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op = 0 ;
00224    }
00225 
00226   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00227   return *pstatus ;
00228 } /* cache_content_close */
00229 
00230 
00231         
00256 cache_content_status_t cache_content_rdwr( cache_content_entry_t        * pentry,
00257                                            cache_content_io_direction_t   read_or_write,
00258                                            fsal_seek_t                  * seek_descriptor,
00259                                            fsal_size_t                  * pio_size_in,
00260                                            fsal_size_t                  * pio_size_out,
00261                                            caddr_t                        buffer, 
00262                                            fsal_boolean_t               * p_fsal_eof,
00263                                            struct stat                  * pbuffstat,
00264                                            cache_content_client_t       * pclient,
00265                                            fsal_op_context_t            * pcontext, 
00266                                            cache_content_status_t       * pstatus ) 
00267 {
00268   fsal_handle_t           * pfsal_handle = NULL ;
00269   fsal_status_t             fsal_status ;
00270   cache_inode_status_t      cache_inode_status ;
00271   cache_content_status_t    cache_content_status ;
00272   fsal_path_t               local_path ;
00273   int                       statindex ;
00274   off_t                     offset ;
00275   size_t                    iosize_before ;
00276   ssize_t                   iosize_after ;
00277   struct stat               buffstat ;
00278   
00279   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00280 
00281 #ifdef _DEBUG_CACHE_CONTENT
00282   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00283                      "---> DATA : IO Size IN = %llu fdsize=%d seeksize=%d", 
00284                      *pio_size_in, sizeof( fsal_file_t ), sizeof( fsal_seek_t ) ) ;
00285 #endif
00286 
00287   /* For now, only FSAL_SEEK_SET is supported */
00288   if( seek_descriptor->whence != FSAL_SEEK_SET )
00289     {
00290       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, 
00291                     "Implementation trouble: seek_descriptor was not a 'FSAL_SEEK_SET' cursor" ) ;
00292       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00293       return *pstatus ;
00294     }
00295   
00296   /* Set the statindex variable */
00297   switch( read_or_write )
00298     {
00299     case CACHE_CONTENT_READ:
00300       statindex = CACHE_CONTENT_READ_ENTRY ;
00301       break ;
00302       
00303     case CACHE_CONTENT_WRITE:
00304       statindex = CACHE_CONTENT_WRITE_ENTRY ;
00305       break ;
00306       
00307     default:
00308       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00309       return *pstatus ;
00310       break ;
00311     }
00312   
00313   /* stat */
00314   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[statindex] += 1 ;
00315   
00316   /* Get the fsal handle */
00317   if( ( pfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry->pentry_inode, &cache_inode_status) ) == NULL )
00318     {
00319       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_BAD_CACHE_INODE_ENTRY ;
00320       
00321       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00322                          "cache_content_new_entry: cannot get handle" ) ;
00323       /* stat */
00324       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00325       
00326       return *pstatus ;
00327     }
00328   
00329   /* Convert the path to FSAL path */
00330   fsal_status =  FSAL_str2path( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, MAXPATHLEN, &local_path )  ;
00331   
00332   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00333     {
00334       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_FSAL_ERROR ;
00335       
00336       /* stat */
00337       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00338       
00339       return *pstatus ;
00340     }
00341   
00342   /* Parameters conversion */
00343   offset = cache_content_fsal_seek_convert( *seek_descriptor, pstatus ) ;
00344   if( *pstatus != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00345     {
00346       /* stat */
00347       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00348       
00349       return *pstatus ;
00350     }
00351 
00352   iosize_before = cache_content_fsal_size_convert( *pio_size_in , pstatus ) ;
00353   if( *pstatus != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00354   {
00355     /* stat */
00356     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00357     
00358     return *pstatus ;
00359     }
00360 
00361   /* Open the local fd for reading */
00362   if( cache_content_open( pentry, pclient, pstatus ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00363     {
00364       return *pstatus ;
00365     }
00366   
00367   /* Perform the IO through the cache */
00368   switch( read_or_write )
00369     {
00370     case CACHE_CONTENT_READ:
00371       /* The file content was completely read before the IO. The read operation is fully done locally */
00372       if( ( iosize_after = pread( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd, buffer, iosize_before, offset ) ) == -1 )
00373         {
00374           /* stat */
00375           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00376           
00377           *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00378           return *pstatus ;
00379         }
00380       
00381       if( ( cache_content_status = cache_content_valid( pentry, CACHE_CONTENT_OP_GET, pclient ) )  != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00382         {
00383            *pstatus = cache_content_status ;
00384            return *pstatus ;
00385         }
00386       
00387       /* Get the eof */
00388       if( iosize_after == 0 )
00389         *p_fsal_eof = TRUE ;
00390       else
00391         *p_fsal_eof = FALSE ;
00392           
00393       break ;
00394       
00395     case CACHE_CONTENT_WRITE:
00396       /* The io is done on the cache before being flushed to the FSAL */
00397       if( ( iosize_after = pwrite( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd, buffer, iosize_before, offset ) ) == -1 )
00398         {
00399           /* stat */
00400           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00401           
00402           *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00403           return *pstatus ;
00404         }
00405       
00406       if( ( cache_content_status = cache_content_valid( pentry, CACHE_CONTENT_OP_SET, pclient ) ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00407         {
00408             *pstatus = cache_content_status ;
00409            return *pstatus ;
00410         }
00411 
00412       /* p_fsal_eof has no meaning here, it is unused */
00413 
00414       break ;
00415     }
00416 
00417   /* close the local fd */
00418   if( cache_content_close( pentry, pclient, pstatus ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00419     return *pstatus ;
00420   
00421   *pio_size_out = (fsal_size_t)iosize_after ;
00422 
00423   /* Return the 'stat' as seen in the cache */
00424   if( stat( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, &buffstat ) == -1  ) 
00425     {
00426         *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00427     }
00428   else
00429    {
00430         if( pbuffstat != NULL )
00431           *pbuffstat = buffstat ;
00432    }
00433 
00434   
00435   return *pstatus ;
00436 } /* cache_content_rdwr */
